docs.snippet: A top shortstop, Dark led the New York Giants’ pennant-winning teams in the 1950s, then managed them into the World Series in San Francisco. But his comments about minority players shadowed him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A top shortstop, Dark led the New York Giants’ pennant-winning teams in the 1950s, then managed them into the World Series in San Francisco. But his comments about minority players shadowed him.
docs.abstract: Alvin Dark, who was the All-Star shortstop and captain of the New York Giants’ pennant-winning teams in the 1950s and went on to manage the team to a pennant in San Francisco, dies at age 92.

headline.main: Alvin Dark, 92, Dies; Led Giants to Pennants as Captain and Manager
headline.print_headline: Alvin Dark, 92, Is Dead; Led Giants to 3 Pennants

docs.snippet: Kershaw became the first National League pitcher to win both the Cy Young and M.V.P. awards since Bob Gibson in 1968....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kershaw became the first National League pitcher to win both the Cy Young and M.V.P. awards since Bob Gibson in 1968.
docs.abstract: Clayton Kershaw, ace pitcher of Los Angeles Dodgers, becomes the first National League pitcher to win both the Cy Young and MVP awards since Bob Gibson in 1968; Los Angeles Angels center fielder Mike Trout, takes the American League MVP honor.

headline.main: Clayton Kershaw and Mike Trout Run Away With M.V.P. Votes
headline.print_headline: Stars in Southern California Strip Drama From the M.V.P. Voting

docs.snippet: Yuki Yanagita drove in four runs from the leadoff spot, Hisashi Iwakuma was hit hard and Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars 8-4 Friday to take a 2-0 lead in their five-game series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yuki Yanagita drove in four runs from the leadoff spot, Hisashi Iwakuma was hit hard and Japan beat the Major League Baseball All-Stars 8-4 Friday to take a 2-0 lead in their five-game series.

headline.main: Yanagita Leads Japan Over MLB All-Stars 8-4
headline.print_headline: Yanagita Leads Japan Over MLB All-Stars 8-4

docs.snippet: We've come a long way since Hall of Famers Mickey Mantle and Willie Mays were banned from baseball for associating with gamblers — not betting on games or tipping them off about injuries, but by shaking their hands as Atlantic City casino gr...
docs.lead_paragraph: We've come a long way since Hall of Famers Mickey Mantle and Willie Mays were banned from baseball for associating with gamblers — not betting on games or tipping them off about injuries, but by shaking their hands as Atlantic City casino greeters.

headline.main: Pro Sports Leagues Gradually Embrace Gambling

docs.snippet: Fans at last month's World Series and recent Kansas City Chiefs games were endangered by filthy conditions in food-service areas at the city's two professional sports stadiums — including cockroaches, mouse feces and food kept at unsafe temp...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fans at last month's World Series and recent Kansas City Chiefs games were endangered by filthy conditions in food-service areas at the city's two professional sports stadiums — including cockroaches, mouse feces and food kept at unsafe temperatures, according to a man who managed food safety at the facilities.

headline.main: Kansas City Stadium Food Areas Criticized as Dirty
headline.print_headline: Kansas City Stadium Food Areas Criticized as Dirty
